python:
from event_manager import *
import sys
import uselect
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from mqtt import *
from machine import RTC
import ntptime
import time
from aiot_lcd1602 import LCD1602
from machine import Pin, SoftI2C
from aiot_dht20 import DHT20
from aiot_rgbled import RGBLed

event_manager.reset()

def read_terminal_input():
  spoll=uselect.poll()        # Set up an input polling object.
  spoll.register(sys.stdin, uselect.POLLIN)    # Register polling object.

  input = ''
  if spoll.poll(0):
    input = sys.stdin.read(1)

    while spoll.poll(0):
      input = input + sys.stdin.read(1)

  spoll.unregister(sys.stdin)
  return input

def on_event_timer_callback_O_s_N_d_S():
  global TEM, LUX, cmd, PIR, HUM, VAR_TEMP, VAR_LUX, PAN_STATUS, LIGHT_STATUS, VAR_PIR
  cmd = read_terminal_input()
  if cmd[int((cmd.find('!') + 1) - 1) : int(cmd.find('-') + 1)] == '!nutnhan1-':
    if cmd[int((cmd.find('-') + 1) - 1) : int(cmd.find('#') + 1)] == '-1#':
      PAN_STATUS = 1
    else:
      PAN_STATUS = 0
  if cmd[int((cmd.find('!') + 1) - 1) : int(cmd.find('-') + 1)] == '!nutnhan2-':
    if cmd[int((cmd.find('-') + 1) - 1) : int(cmd.find('#') + 1)] == '-1#':
      LIGHT_STATUS = 1
    else:
      LIGHT_STATUS = 0
  if cmd[int((cmd.find('!') + 1) - 1) : int(cmd.find('_') + 1)] == '!va-tem_':
    VAR_TEMP = int((cmd[int(((cmd.find('_') + 1) + 1) - 1) : int((cmd.find('#') + 1) - 1)]))
  if cmd[int((cmd.find('!') + 1) - 1) : int(cmd.find('_') + 1)] == '!va-lux_':
    VAR_LUX = int((cmd[int(((cmd.find('_') + 1) + 1) - 1) : int((cmd.find('#') + 1) - 1)]))
  if cmd[int((cmd.find('!') + 1) - 1) : int(cmd.find('_') + 1)] == '!va-pir_':
    VAR_PIR = int((cmd[int(((cmd.find('_') + 1) + 1) - 1) : int((cmd.find('#') + 1) - 1)]))

event_manager.add_timer_event(500, on_event_timer_callback_O_s_N_d_S)

aiot_lcd1602 = LCD1602()

aiot_dht20 = DHT20()

def on_event_timer_callback_H_X_q_I_H():
  global TEM, LUX, cmd, PIR, HUM, VAR_TEMP, VAR_LUX, PAN_STATUS, LIGHT_STATUS, VAR_PIR
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  print((''.join([str(x) for x in ['!ST:', 'TEM_', aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature(), '-', 'HUM_', aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity(), '-', 'LUX_', round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100)), ':FN#']])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(10000, on_event_timer_callback_H_X_q_I_H)

def on_event_timer_callback_Q_X_H_Q_L():
  global TEM, LUX, cmd, PIR, HUM, VAR_TEMP, VAR_LUX, PAN_STATUS, LIGHT_STATUS, VAR_PIR
  aiot_dht20.read_dht20()
  TEM = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  HUM = aiot_dht20.dht20_humidity()
  LUX = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(TEM)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('*C')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(6, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(7, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(HUM)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(LUX)
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(15, 0)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('%')

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_Q_X_H_Q_L)

def on_event_timer_callback_K_G_S_a_U():
  global TEM, LUX, cmd, PIR, HUM, VAR_TEMP, VAR_LUX, PAN_STATUS, LIGHT_STATUS, VAR_PIR
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(0, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[2])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(2, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(3, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[1])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(4, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('/')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(5, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[0])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(10, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr('')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(11, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4])))
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(13, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(':')
  aiot_lcd1602.move_to(14, 1)
  aiot_lcd1602.putstr(('%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[5])))

event_manager.add_timer_event(30000, on_event_timer_callback_K_G_S_a_U)

def on_event_timer_callback_K_C_s_p_R():
  global TEM, LUX, cmd, PIR, HUM, VAR_TEMP, VAR_LUX, PAN_STATUS, LIGHT_STATUS, VAR_PIR
  TEM = aiot_dht20.dht20_temperature()
  if PAN_STATUS == 1:
    pin10.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
  else:
    if VAR_TEMP != 0:
      if TEM >= VAR_TEMP:
        pin10.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
      else:
        pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))
    else:
      pin10.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

event_manager.add_timer_event(1000, on_event_timer_callback_K_C_s_p_R)

tiny_rgb = RGBLed(pin0.pin, 4)

def on_event_timer_callback_C_R_B_a_O():
  global TEM, LUX, cmd, PIR, HUM, VAR_TEMP, VAR_LUX, PAN_STATUS, LIGHT_STATUS, VAR_PIR
  LUX = round(translate((pin2.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))
  PIR = pin3.read_digital()==1
  if LIGHT_STATUS == 1:
    tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffff00'))
  else:
    if VAR_PIR == 1:
      if PIR == 1:
        tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ffffff'))
      else:
        tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
    else:
      if VAR_LUX != 0:
        if LUX <= VAR_LUX:
          tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#ff0000'))
        else:
          tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))
      else:
        tiny_rgb.show(0, hex_to_rgb('#000000'))

event_manager.add_timer_event(1000, on_event_timer_callback_C_R_B_a_O)

if True:
  display.scroll('w')
  mqtt.connect_wifi('votiendat', '123456789')
  ntptime.settime()
  (year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour, minute, second, milisecond) = RTC().datetime()
  RTC().init((year, month, mday, week_of_year, hour+7, minute, second, milisecond))
  aiot_lcd1602.clear()
  display.scroll('Ok')
  LIGHT_STATUS = 0
  PAN_STATUS = 0
  VAR_LUX = 0
  VAR_TEMP = 0
  VAR_PIR = 0

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(1000)
  time.sleep_ms(10)
